description: Kything is an almost lost Scottish word which speaks to the act of consciously communicating with an object as described in the book Kything: the art of spiritual presence by Louis Savary and Patricia Berne. To Kythe means to make visible.

entries.meaning: The spiritual process of focusing on one's shared connection with a loved one.
